name: GroveSite
tag_list: online-database-software, collaborative-database, online-collaboration, online-database, online-relational-database, project-management, sharepoint-alternative, online-file-storage
overview:
GroveSite is a leading provider of online collaboration and online database software. Many companies worldwide use GroveSite to better collaborate and more easily manage projects. GroveSite is an easy and affordable SharePoint alternative and is essential for creating easy-to-use intranets, extranets, consulting ports and online relational databases. GroveSite can aid in online collaboration, project management, issue tracking, and document management.

Follow the official GroveSite blog at blogs.grovesite.com, which shares information on how to use online collaboration and online database software. Here you will find useful tips, advice and examples for business users. The blog also includes industry news, a client showcase, and a new online collaboration software series.
